All Implemented Interfaces:
TriggeringPolicy
public final class TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy
extends Object
implements TriggeringPolicy

Triggering Policy that causes a rollover based on time.

createPolicy

                                                     String modulate)
Create a TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy.

Parameters:
